channel.title: Mybb/phpbb
channel.description: Does anyone know how to use Mybb or Phpbb? if you do i was wondering if one of you would be kind enough to give me a tutorial on teamviwer! if you can add my msn mbhartland@hotmail.com Would be so happy been trying to do it for like 3 months im only good at smfforfrre3.com or smfnew.com :(

item.title: Mybb/phpbb
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:3, topic:348495”]I set one up for you for like 2$.[/quote]Why not just do it for free. It takes 20 minutes…

And super leet, I don’t think you understood my reply. You’re question isn’t specific enough. You’re asking “how do I use a forum”… When you’re using one right now. I’m assuming that you want to set forum software up on a website you purchased though… Care to reply back on what exactly you’re talking about?

Read full topic

item.title: Mybb/phpbb
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

What do you mean how to use them? You’re using a forum right now, and every other forum software is the same. If you’re asking how to install it onto a website, that’s another question. Either way, this is the wrong section to post it in.

Read full topic
